feature.label: JBoss Fuse Server Extension Plugins for Eclipse 6.0
feature.description: Red Hat JBoss Fuse Plugins for Eclipse lets you work with Fuse and Apache ActiveMQ, Camel, CXF, Karaf & ServiceMix. You can view, create and edit Enterprise Integration Patterns, browse endpoints and routes, drag and drop messages, trace message flows, deploy your code to Fuse ESB and browse and visualise runtime processes over JMX and Fuse Fabric.
